## Command and Military Police
These rules also apply to any individual who is a MP/Command role (unless they are a member of a hostile force).\n[italic]Command roles are defined as; all heads, cic staff, mp, and squad leaders.[/italic]
- [textlink="1. Command and MP must follow Marine Law." link="RMCMarineLaw"] - [textlink="2. Command and MP are held to a higher standard of play." link="RMCHigherStandards"] - 3. MP should try to remain non-lethal and effect arrests, except in specific special circumstances. - 4. MP will be expected to answer for use of lethal force. - Only a whitelisted CO or Provost may pardon a sentence, but appeals can be done. See marine law. - The goal of [color=#ff000d][bold]MP[/bold][/color] is to make the server a more immersive and enjoyable place for everyone. Do your best to uphold that goal, by mediating conflicts and assisting the crew and marines with their needs with the minimal force required.
